item.title: Demystifying Apache CXF: A RESTful Hello World App
item.description: The first post of this how-to series showed you what it takes to expose a Hello World application as a SOAP over HTTP Web Service using CXF. For this post, I’ll show you how to expose the same app as a RESTful service. In the Java world, we use JAX-RS for mapping a class to a RESTful service. Giving a RESTful interface to our Hello World app is just a matter of adding JAX-RS annotations to HelloWorldImpl:
